snippet.title: Vroom! - Obstacle Racing Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Dear Gamers,
I'm happy to share the first trailer of the game I've been working on in the past 2 months. Vroom! is going to be a battle royale style obstacle racing game where you can drive and customise toy cars and trucks and race online with 60+ players, alone or in a squad in realistic environments. 

The game is planned to be released for PC, PS5 and XBOX series S and X late next year.

If you would like to participate in the alpha and beta weekends for exclusive rewards or just simply interested in the game, join the Vroom! discord: https://discord.gg/mBQ3hdBEJD 

Soundtrack: Kyon - Never Die

© 2021 Vroom! Obstacle Racing by Adam Bernath
